dmIdent.dmTitle: Disconnect and reconnect wiring harness at avionics unit

warning.para: Electrical hazard. Make sure all relevant power sources are switched OFF before starting.

caution.para: Risk of equipment damage. Do not bend or damage connector pins.

proceduralStep.para: Disconnect the wiring harness from the avionics unit connector.
Secure the harness to prevent strain or impact damage.

note.para: Tag and cap connectors as required by local shop practices.

proceduralStep.para: To reconnect, connect the harness and engage the locking mechanism.
Verify the connector is fully seated and locked.
